system.description:
Your bonded artifact and innate magical abilities have fully merged into a fearsome unified whole. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Charisma or wielder spellcasting ability increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your wielder levels count as sorcerer levels for the purpose of gaining the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.q3gqqfr37rumjbf6]{Rapturous Presence} feature.
  • Half your sorcerer levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of gaining the Artifact Incarnate feature.
  • You can spend a sorcery point as a bonus action to summon your bonded artifact to you if it is on the same plane. It appears in your hand (if it is a weapon or font of power) or equipped on your body (if it is an armor of power). If it would displace something else (a suit of armor you are already wearing, for example) you can either have it trade places with the other object or the other object can appear at your feet. At the Narrator’s discretion, certain effects may be able to block this feature.
